instruction: Create a podcast series cover art (image), intro music (audio), and episode summary template (text). Define the aesthetic and thematic consistency across them.
output-abstract: 1. Cover Art, 2. Intro Music, 3. Episode Summary Template.
output-detail: 1. Cover Art: Select a central theme reflecting podcast content, incorporate symbolic elements into the design. 2. Intro Music: Compose a short piece that captures the podcast's mood, use instruments that align with the theme. 3. Episode Summary Template: Design a text format that includes sections for episode title, guest names, key points, and a closing thought. Ensure the template's font and style match the art and music vibes.

instruction: Design a digital marketing campaign for an eco-friendly product, including an advertisement video (video), a series of promotional images (image), and engaging post captions (text).
output-abstract: 1. Advertisement Video, 2. Promotional Images, 3. Post Captions.
output-detail: 1. Advertisement Video: Storyboard a narrative emphasizing eco-friendliness, use natural lighting and greenery for scenes. Include customer testimonials. 2. Promotional Images: Capture the product in natural settings, employ photo editing to highlight its eco-friendly aspects. 3. Post Captions: Draft text that tells a story about the product's impact on the environment, include compelling calls-to-action that link back to the product's unique selling proposition.

instruction: Create an e-learning course on basic photography, incorporating a course outline (text), lesson presentations (image), and instructional videos (video). Detail the structure and interactivity aspects.
output-abstract: 1. Course Outline, 2. Lesson Presentations, 3. Instructional Videos.
output-detail: 1. Course Outline: Break down the course into modules covering different photography basics, like composition, lighting, and editing. 2. Lesson Presentations: Use vibrant images and infographics to illustrate points in each module, ensure visual consistency across presentations. 3. Instructional Videos: Produce step-by-step guides for practical photography exercises, incorporate picture-in-picture editing to show camera settings in action.

instruction: Develop a brand identity package for a new coffee shop, including logo design (image), brand story (text), and a signature background music playlist (audio). Highlight the brand's unique atmosphere.
output-abstract: 1. Logo Design, 2. Brand Story, 3. Signature Music Playlist.
output-detail: 1. Logo Design: Craft a logo that combines coffee-related imagery with elements reflecting the shop’s unique atmosphere, like warmth or modernity. 2. Brand Story: Write a narrative that delves into the origins of the shop, the passion behind it, and the experience it aims to provide. 3. Signature Music Playlist: Curate a playlist that matches the shop’s vibe, blending genres to cater to a diverse clientele while maintaining an overall cohesive mood.

instruction: Produce a travel vlog series documenting a trip across Europe, featuring vlogs (video), photography (image), and a travel diary (text). Discuss the integration of storytelling elements across the contents.
output-abstract: 1. Vlogs, 2. Photography, 3. Travel Diary.
output-detail: 1. Vlogs: Record daily activities, highlight spontaneous moments and scenic views. Use a personal storytelling style to engage viewers. 2. Photography: Capture landscapes, architectural details, and candid moments. Use these images to complement the vlog storyline. 3. Travel Diary: Write detailed accounts of each destination, including personal reflections and travel tips. Integrate diary entries with vlogs and photography to offer a comprehensive travel narrative.

instruction: Construct a comprehensive fitness guide for beginners, containing workout routines (text), demonstration videos (video), and motivational before-and-after images (image). Emphasize proper form and safety.
output-abstract: 1. Workout Routines, 2. Demonstration Videos, 3. Before-and-After Images.
output-detail: 1. Workout Routines: Write down exercises for different body parts, detailing sets, reps, and rest times. 2. Demonstration Videos: Record video instructions showing correct posture and movements for each exercise, highlighting common mistakes. 3. Before-and-After Images: Showcase transformation stories through images to motivate beginners, ensuring the presentation respects privacy and promotes a healthy body image.

instruction: Orchestrate an online art exhibition, featuring a virtual gallery tour (video), artist interviews (audio), and a catalog of artworks (image). Discuss how each element contributes to an immersive experience.
output-abstract: 1. Virtual Gallery Tour, 2. Artist Interviews, 3. Artwork Catalog.

Artwork Catalog: Compile high-quality images of the artworks with descriptions, arranging them in a visually appealing manner that encourages exploration.

instruction: Design a social media challenge to promote a new album release, involving a dance challenge video (video), a catchy hashtag (text), and a filter effect depicting the album theme (image).
output-abstract: 1. Dance Challenge Video, 2. Catchy Hashtag, 3. Filter Effect.
output-detail: 1. Dance Challenge Video: Choreograph a simple yet engaging dance, film a demonstration video that highlights the album’s core musical themes. 2. Catchy Hashtag: Develop a memorable and relevant hashtag that encapsulates the essence of the album and encourages sharing. 3. Filter Effect: Design a filter that reflects the album's artwork and mood, making it compelling for users to add to their own challenge videos.

instruction: Compile a comprehensive guidebook for a video game, including gameplay strategies (text), walkthrough videos (video), and character art (image). Highlight how the guide complements the gaming experience.

instruction: Produce a series of cooking tutorial videos for beginners, incorporating recipe cards (text), step-by-step cooking videos (video), and photos of the finished dishes (image). Emphasize ease of preparation.

Finished Dish Photos: Capture appealing photos of the completed recipes, styled to inspire beginners to try cooking them.

instruction: Create a multilingual educational platform for children, featuring interactive storybooks (text+image), pronunciation guides (audio), and educational games (video). Discuss content accessibility and engagement strategies.

instruction: Launch a digital art contest focusing on environmental awareness, requiring submission of digital artwork (image), artist's statement (text), and a time-lapse of the art creation process (video). Outline participant guidelines.
output-abstract: 1. Digital Artwork, 2. Artist's Statement, 3. Art Creation Time-Lapse.

instruction: Organize a virtual music festival, including live performances (video), artist interviews (audio), and downloadable festival posters (image). Explain how each component enhances the festival experience.

instruction: Develop a virtual reality (VR) tour of historical sites, featuring narrated tour guides (audio), interactive maps (image), and detailed exploration videos (video). Focus on user engagement and educational value.

instruction: Create a thematic content series for a fashion blog, incorporating trend analysis (text), designer interviews (audio), and photo shoots (image). Discuss how the elements interlink to provide a comprehensive view.
